item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, December 19, 2024 at 1:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Solaar is a Linux manager for many Logitech keyboards, mice, and other devices (209 points | 95 comments)
2. ISO 8583: The language of credit cards (182 points | 31 comments)
3. Cultural Evolution of Cooperation Among LLM Agents (208 points | 103 comments)
4. Embedding Lua in Sqleibniz with Rust (9 points | discuss)
5. Apple Watch with Android (102 points | 45 comments)
6. Show HN: K8s Cleaner – Roomba for Kubernetes (49 points | 28 comments)
7. Launch HN: Innate (YC F24) – Home robots as easy to program as AI agents (105 points | 56 comments)
8. Self-sorting arrays reveal unexpected competencies in minimal intelligence (9 points | 1 comment)
9. Windshield pitting incidents in Washington reach fever pitch on April 15, 1954 (2003) (231 points | 157 comments)
10. The unbearable slowness of being: Why do we live at 10 bits/s? (235 points | 269 comments)
11. Java in the Small (176 points | 115 comments)
12. Updates to H-1B (233 points | 632 comments)
13. Corvus Robotics (YC S18) is hiring a Head of Software to help inventory drones ( | hide)
14. The moonbit compiler is available on GitHub (5 points | 1 comment)
15. "The Custer Wolf is Dead." (1921) [pdf] (30 points | 5 comments)
16. Silver amulet is the oldest evidence of Christianity north of the Alps (245 points | 235 comments)
17. Formally Modeling Dreidel, the Sequel (74 points | 21 comments)
18. CDC confirms first severe human case of bird flu in U.S. (121 points | 28 comments)
19. Consider the Shipwreck: Ten Books on Maritime Disasters and Ecological Collapse (7 points | discuss)
20. The RAM Myth (5 points | discuss)
21. Optimizing Ruby's JSON, Part 1 (235 points | 56 comments)
22. BlackSheep: Fast ASGI web framework for Python (37 points | 16 comments)
23. On-silicon real-time AI compute governance from Nvidia, Intel, EQTY Labs (21 points | 21 comments)
24. Apple Says Meta Is Making Unreasonable Interoperability Requests Under EU's DMA (8 points | 1 comment)
25. Moon (2808 points | 235 comments)
26. Saturn's rings could be much older than scientists first thought (10 points | 2 comments)
27. GitHub Copilot is now available for free (413 points | 224 comments)
28. Apple collaborates with Nvidia to research faster LLM performance (36 points | 22 comments)
29. Crashing rockets and recovering data from damaged flash chips (46 points | 13 comments)
30. Show HN: Musoq – Query Anything with SQL Syntax (Git, C#, CSV, Can DBC) (21 points | 1 comment)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, December 19, 2024 at 1:15 AM UTC
